programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends; Pups Save a Puffy Mayor

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save the Chalk Art; Pups Save the Hot Potato

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.sub-title: The Crew and Marshall Build a Fire Station
programme.desc: Rubble and Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from PAW Patrol's Marshall; when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: PAW Patrol

programme.desc: The Mighty Pups must stop Sweetie from using her new powers to take over Adventure Bay; Mighty Nano gets the hiccups, so it's up to Liberty and the Mighty Pups to find a cure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups and the Lighthouse Boogie; Pups Save Ryder
programme.desc: When a storm sends Mayor Goodway's rowboat drifting out to sea, the PAW Patrol must come to the rescue; Ryder gets stranded while trying to rescue a goat who is stuck on the edge of a cliff.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Great Race; Pups Take the Cake
programme.desc: The pups plan to race each other on Adventure Bay Race Day; Mr. Porter enters a cake competition.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.sub-title: Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Shark; Sea Patrol: Pups Save the Pier
programme.desc: Humdinger makes a robotic shark to scare everyone away from the beach; the pups come to the rescue when the pier has a broken support post.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.sub-title: Parroting Pups; Merpups Save the Turbots
programme.desc: When Rocky loses his voice, Matea the parrot helps him bark out his puppack tools; the Merpups return to help the PAW Patrol on a rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save the Diving Bell; Pups Save the Beavers
programme.desc: The PAW Patrol uses Zuma's new submarine to help Cap'n Turbot; when a storm washes away Chompy the Beaver's dam, he starts chomping wood all over town.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew

programme.desc: Rubble moves with his family of construction pups to the nearby town of Builder Cove where they live, play and build whatever the community needs.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.sub-title: The Crew Builds a Train Station; The Crew Builds a Sierra Sparkle Sign
programme.desc: Rubble and Crew build the first train station in Builder Cove just in time to welcome Farmer Zoe's new cow, Mooreen; Popstar Sierra Sparkle is moving to Builder Cove, but when the pups plan a surprise greeting, Speed Meister makes a plan of his own.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save the Bay; Pups Save a Goodway

programme.title: PAW Patrol

programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest; the pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save a Runaway Robo-Chicken Purse; Pups Save the Buggy Trekkers
programme.desc: Digi and Tal's inventions to help a busy Mayor Goodway go haywire and lead to a wild woodland chase; when Mayor Humdinger squeezes himself into the Trekkers' friendly dune buggy race, his cheating ways put the other racers in jeopardy.
